name: Sucrose
desc: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

elemSkill.name: Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308
elemSkill.desc: Creates a small Wind Spirit that pulls opponents and objects towards its location, launches opponents within its AoE, and deals Anemo DMG.\n\nThis is a little embarrassing, but though the elemental lifeforms birthed through this procedure dissipate very rapidly, they are incredibly useful when adventuring. Even failed experiments can have practical applications.

elemBurst.name: Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II
elemBurst.desc: Sucrose hurls an unstable concoction that creates a Large Wind Spirit. While it persists, the Large Wind Spirit will continuously pull in surrounding opponents and objects, launch nearby opponents, and deal Anemo DMG. Elemental Absorption If the Wind Spirit comes into contact with Hydro/Pyro/Cryo/Electro energy, it will deal additional elemental DMG of that type. Elemental Absorption may only occur once per use. Sucrose used to give names to her volatile Anemo Hypostases, but their line of heirs quickly grew to surpass Baron Bunny the 893rd.

attackSkill.name: Normal Attack: Wind Spirit Creation
attackSkill.desc:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Performs up to 4 attacks using Wind Spirits, dealing <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG</color>.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina and deals <color=#80FFD7FF>AoE Anemo DMG</color> after a short casting time.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Calling upon the power of her Wind Spirits, Sucrose plunges towards the ground from mid-air, damaging all opponents in her path. Deals <color=#80FFD7FF>AoE Anemo DMG</color> upon impact with the ground.

c13ns.name: Beth: Unbound Form
c13ns.desc: The duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> is increased by 2s.

c13ns.name: Flawless Alchemistress
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Alchemania
c13ns.desc: Every 7 Normal and Charged Attacks, Sucrose will reduce the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308</color> by 1-7s.

c13ns.name: Caution: Standard Flask
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Chaotic Entropy
c13ns.desc: If <color=#FFD780FF>Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II</color> triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.
